blog.name: sep28secret
blog.title: audri // larriebaby
blog.description: i genuinely believe that these 5 angels are my heroes// personal —> @laurelflaur

body:
They just love each other

We always say that Liam treats Harry or Niall like his babies, Lou or Zayn as his kids. Or just any of the boys treating each other like whatever we call it.


But do you really think that they thought in the beggining like “im gonna treat this boys like.. this or that”?


While, really, they dont think that way. They just treat each other the way they know how someone would treat the people they love. They dont think that they have the ‘role’ to play in particular (in each other’s life). It kind of just happens. They just love each other.

blog.name: domestic-styles
blog.title: Harry On!
blog.description: Shelli // @charligirlmusic // Harry Styles Blog // Author - Music Series requests are open // Respect, be kind, no drama. ALL RIGHTS OF LYRICS/PHOTOS TO THOSE WHO OWN THEM! Mobile Music Series Masterlist / Mobile Novel Masterlist / Music Series Masterlist / Novel & Tags Masterlist / Ask Me Anything

summary: Could you give me a short summary of your stories? Warm hugs
question: Could you give me a short summary of your stories? Warm hugs
answer:
I would love to, thanks! I will link the first chapter of each story to their titles. Not sure I do this well, it’s not easy for authors to summarize tens of thousands of words into a paragraph…but here ya go:

For The Love Of Harry: My first attempt at writing a novel, a romantic suspense, which is what I mostly write in novels. Harry is friends with the OFC/reader by association…she is the girlfriend of his best mate, Alex. When his best friend becomes a complete dick, Harry helps her deal with the break up as they nurture the attraction they have always secretly had for each other. Quite a lot of smut in this one.

The Preschool Teacher: My second and most popular novel to date. Harry is a single dad, raising his 3 year old son, Jack, with the child’s disaster of a mother, Ramona. The OFC/reader is Jack’s preschool teacher, whom Harry pursues as his love interest. The story centers mostly on the battle of custody over Jack while their relationship develops. Technically this one is probably more of a romance, but does have a sense of urgency about it, and again, quite a lot of smut. I’ve been asked many times to create a sequel, which I am working on but have not written yet.

If Only But A Moment: My third novel, another romantic suspense, this is the first novel I have rewritten and submitted for publication to a publishing company. Harry and the OFC/reader have been best friends since the age of 10, their relationship and subsequent romance developing along the way. When their world explodes and they split, the OFC disappears and Harry, realizing he is still in love with her, sets out to find her, as she reappears back in their hometown of Cheshire, but she isn’t alone. Much more mystery but with less smut, as I wanted to concentrate more on the plot and characters with this one. My favorite part of this story is that each chapter begins with a memory from their past before jumping into the present, which is what sparked this story.

Gaslight: My fourth novel and most recent, another romantic suspense, it is another bestfriend!Harry story with a subplot of romance. I wrote this one after watching the old black and white movie, Gaslight. Mind manipulation is the key factor, as Harry stands by his best friend, an artist, to try and protect and be a friend to her as the story plays out. Again, less smut in this one, and it did spark a little controversy, but I stand behind it.

Music Series: This is a series of one shots which I created due to my passion for music and writing. Not only am I a writer, but I am working on my songwriting career, as well. I love the visuals that a good lyric tells, so I had the idea to write short stories from songs that I love. After I posted a few, I began receiving requests for specific songs, and to date I have around 200 of these one shots available. I do still accept requests, and I am also working on writing stories for each of the 1D albums, as well as Harry’s solo album. Some of my one shots are smutty, but the majority are simply romance, and I have created several series, which are listed on both of the MS masterlist pages: mobile list and tag list. My most popular Music Series imagine to date is Jealous by Nick Jonas, but I cover many, many artists and songs, so I encourage my readers to not just read the imagines for the songs and artists they like, but ALL of them. They are all about Harry! (I’ll never understand why this happens, ha!) I also have a playlist on Spotify specifically for this series, so be sure to follow it and follow me there and I will follow back!

So that sums up everything I’ve posted to this point. I have dozens more stories I have not posted, and a prompt list of over 100, so I will continue writing as long as people continue enjoying and letting me know what they think. As a note, all of my writings which contain smut are marked with a double asterisk (**). 

I hope this is what you were wanting. Let me know what you think of my stories. I greatly appreciate my readers and their feedback. It’s why I started posting my work on this forum, to find out if my writing is good enough to consider publishing, so all feedback is appreciated.

I hope everyone is having a beautiful week! Much love, and Harry On! xo

Shelli

blog.name: 1direction-unpopularopinions
blog.title: Unpopular Opinions
blog.description: BANNED TOPICS: DRUGS, SEXUALITY. Welcome to 1Direction -UnpopularOpinions. Please feel free to send in your opinions about the boys or anything & anyone related to 1D. They are posted anonymously. We post everything, except anything we find inappropriate. Enjoy your stay!

summary: imagine you taking a nap on harrys bed and he thinks you’re just adorable with your lips smushed and your hair a little messy...
body: imagine you taking a nap on harrys bed and he thinks you’re just adorable with your lips smushed and your hair a little messy and you look so soft and content so he hacks your instagram and posts a pic of you napping with the caption: “Love, H.”

reblog.comment: imagine you taking a nap on harrys bed and he thinks you’re just adorable with your lips smushed and your hair a little messy and you look so soft and content so he hacks your instagram and posts a pic of you napping with the caption: “Love, H.”

blog.name: nicholascrvtch
blog.title: technically single
blog.description: i've got daddy issues pumping in my blood, leaking into my soul, like the drugs that lift my spirits to forget them. i will never be who you want me to be, dearest father, but i am who i am, and if i'm everything you so desperately hate, then so be it.

blog.name: the-sound-of-distant-thunder
blog.title: You Mean HALT!
blog.description:
Hi, I'm Rose (or Kili).
My heart belongs to the 17th Century.
19 year old lover of music, books and films. I like some TV. I play guitar (badly) and I'm a feminist from the UK.
Currently embareking on the adventure known as University where I am in my Second Year of Disability Studies in Education.
I have Spina Bifida and mild Hydrocephalus but no shunt. Welcome to the world through my eyes! 
You're all beautiful and amazing! Never let anyone tell you any differently.
Them/They/Their please.

twitter

summary: y/nstyles: Grateful to have a best friend like you. Thank you so much for coming to visit me and H and Henny. Love youuuuu. x...
body:
y/nstyles: Grateful to have a best friend like you. Thank you so much for coming to visit me and H and Henny. Love youuuuu. x

fan_account1: Are you alright? How’s postpartum going? I hope you’re okay!
y/nstyles: I’m fine! I must not seem too happy in this picture but I promise it’s just the wind blowing and I was getting sand in my eyes. Thank you for being so sweet! x

fan_account2: Will you be posting Hensley’s baby photoshoot soon?
y/nstyles: I will be once I have the photos back! x

fan_account3: How are you and Harry enjoying parenting life?
y/nstyles: We absolutely love it! Harry is the best father, and we are enjoying our time together so much. He’s taking up all the time with her he can because he goes back to the studio soon! x

blog.description: Mibba is a creative writing site designed for authors to share their stories, poems and articles and gain feedback from a growing audience.

title: Lust or More
body:
Draco Malfoy Love Story

Adventure of A Lifetime

“Do you have everything?” I look him over. All I could see was that he owns another black suit.“I’m going to a magically war, what more do I need?” He waves his wand around.“Your broom or…

Read more…

title: In Too Deep
body:
A Niall Horan AU

Fourteen

“Wylla.” Niall whispered kissing her neck slowly. Wylla whimpered and leaned into his body. “Wylla, come on.” Niall chuckled. Wylla just whined at him. “Baby, come on. You have to get up for classes.”…

Read more…

title: Cross Country |ReMastered|
body:
~I’m Outta My Mind~ |H.S|

|Cravings|

H A D L E YEvery day I walked down the halls just to see if he was here, I’m slowly becoming obsessed with him, his devious smile, his shaken mop of curls, his eyes that shadow when he desires…
